00031 #include "ltlenv/environment.hh"

00033 namespace spot
00034 {
00035   namespace ltl
00036   {
00037 
00040     class atomic_prop : public ref_formula
00041     {
00042     public:
00045       static atomic_prop* instance(const std::string& name, environment& env);
00046 
00047       virtual void accept(visitor& visitor);
00048       virtual void accept(const_visitor& visitor) const;
00049 
00051       const std::string& name() const;
00053       environment& env() const;
00054 
00056       static unsigned instance_count();
00058       static std::ostream& dump_instances(std::ostream& os);
00059 
00060     protected:
00061       atomic_prop(const std::string& name, environment& env);
00062       virtual ~atomic_prop();
00063 
00064       typedef std::pair<std::string, environment*> pair;
00065       typedef std::map<pair, atomic_prop*> map;
00066       static map instances;
00067 
00068     private:
00069       std::string name_;
00070       environment* env_;
00071     };
